website_summaries.verdict: With a new $99 set of controllers and activity tracker, you can play games on an iOS device while working out, and your level of intensity drives the game forward. But the gameplay and resulting workout weren't all that thrilling in our trials.
pros: Interesting exergaming concept designed for cardio equipment
cons: Can't effectively use on a treadmill

customer_reviews.title: Games are boring
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations for goji play based on the description. Unfortunately, the games you can download for it are pretty boring and not very engaging to play so I lost interest in the system after only a couple uses. I tried about 10 games and everyone just seemed tedious. I got it to help make my exercise bike rides more motivating when I would do very long rides but listening to a decent playlist on my phone is more motivating than these games. I feel like this had a lot of potential but they really blew it. If the games were better, this could be a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: L. B.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CONCEPT BUT ONE HAS TO KEEP SPENDING
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant concept but it has a way to go with respect to the games offered. What I found both interesting and disappointing, was the wide selection of games that can be downloaded. That was the interesting part. The disappointing part is the fact you are charged for each game. The free ones are pretty basic and the novelty runs out quickly. My hope as that as this product matures and the competition expands that the games offered will expand and they will stop gouging you for what should be part of the package.
customer_reviews.author: Senor Gancho

customer_reviews.title: I love this, I only wish it was enough to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I only wish it was enough to make me want to use the elliptical enough to make this purchase worth it. The games are fun enough, though still difficult to control while working out. I'd like some better games and better control in game, but otherwise this is really pretty cool. I rarely use it anymore, though its not because they weren't fun, its because I don't want to work out and even these couldn't tempt me into doing it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Heltsley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I'm updating my previous review. After I posted some concerns about bugginess with the product, I was stunned to see the company email me personally and work with me to address my concerns. While the apps still have a way to come (check iTunes reviews for more info), I'm really impressed by this company's commitment to its customers. It portends very good developments for the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Gamer working out
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea. I would like to see some better games come out of this. The games are fairly simple. What about a riding track or a ride through the mountains? I use it on my bike and elliptical. Some of the games really do make a workout seem shorter, but given all the video games out there, there is room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Fonda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fun Exercise
customer_reviews.text: I was weary about trying this out, but it has been totally worth the cost! There are quite a few free games and the controllers are really natural to run with on the treadmill. I used it with my iphone 4s and it was a little small for my taste---but not impossible. Definitely works best with a tablet/iPad
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Frank

customer_reviews.title: MY WORK OUT TIME HAS DOUBLED
customer_reviews.text: THE PRODUCT IS MADE WELL AND WORKS GREAT . THE GAMES ARE LOTS OF FUN AND YOU MUST EXCERCISE TO PLAY SO YOU DO! I USE AN ELIPTICAL AND WAS STRUGGLING TO GET 15 MINUTES ( ONE MILE) KNOCKED OUT A WORKOUT AND HAVE MORE THAN DOUBLED THAT TO 30 OR 40 MINUTES A WORKOUT AND ITS REALLY HELPED ME GET BACK ON TRACK IN THIS WINTER WEATHER. MORE NEW GAMES JUST CAME OUT TRIED A COUPLE AND THEY ALSO WERE LOTS OF FUN. THE MAIN SOFTWARE IS ALSO MOTIVATING WITH STATS AND GOALS AND RUNS VERY SMOOTHLY LASTLY, SHIPPED TO ME VERY FAST AND IN PERFECT SHAPE.
customer_reviews.author: G0BLUE

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's a good gift that easy to get and send on line
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and good selection of games
customer_reviews.text: Super fun and good selection of games. Probably even better for people who aren't gamers because it keeps you engaged. My controller had some trouble connecting to my phone the first time. I just shut everything off and on a few times and it's been fine since.
customer_reviews.author: Susan O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: absolutely wonderful better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought one for everyone in my extended family that has an iPad or phone. I love it. I'm 53 and have not sweat like this in years. I feel so much better. It is so easy to use, so much fun. No problems at all with connectivity. Quality piece and games are top of the line too. I cannot tell you how much I love it. I use it with an elliptical and treadmill. You really do forget you are working out...... too busy trying to get to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Linda yoder

customer_reviews.title: Working out is fun again!
customer_reviews.text: This makes working out fun and makes it go by fast!! It also works with Apple TV if you want to have it on a big screen.
customer_reviews.author: Googler

customer_reviews.title: not quite 5 but close
customer_reviews.text: This did keep my mind occupied on something other than working out. Unlike a tv show that you know how long it is, your just playing games and trying to get better each time and then clock time becomes irrelevant. Good choices for games, they are challenging and it feel like Im training to rub my belly, pat my head and chew gum at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool to use while working out.... It does make the time on the treadmill go by faster
customer_reviews.author: Eric C

customer_reviews.title: Really fun
customer_reviews.text: Arrived from the US in about 10 days. Had to pay the VAT on top of price before the post office could deliver it. Very simple to set up, just download the Goji app, pair the controllers with the app, attach the motion sensor to either your training shoe or the pedal of the bike, select your game & off you go. Can't stand riding bikes but this keeps me on my excercise bike for 15 minutes a day....
customer_reviews.author: miss google

customer_reviews.title: Exercise is boring? Not with Goji play!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It makes exercise so much fun. The controllers are light and easy to use, and each game comes with it's own (simple) instructions. I hope they come up with more games, though.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: The concept is great but most games are lame
customer_reviews.text: If Blue Goji can get devs to build the controls into their games, this controller would be very good. The games they produce are terrible. The Bluetooth connection also needs a little work. Having something to do other than listen to music and watching TV is a welcome change.
customer_reviews.author: S. Burnett-Wolle

customer_reviews.title: Makes 5 minutes if exercise feel like 30!
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed I wasted $100 on this! It is such a great idea, but unfortunately the games are all terrible and many of them I can't even get to work with the controllers. I can only play for a couple minites before I get bored and switch back to my iPod. Do yourself a favor and download the compatible games before buying and make sure you will actually want to play them because they certainly are of no interest to me and just seem to make the time pass much slower! Mine is going back on the shelf for now and I just have to hope they come out with some better games in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Peterson

customer_reviews.title: why no PoS in Europe ?
customer_reviews.text: Blue Goji is an amazing product. But very difficult to have it in europe. I love it, especially with the run game with the little dog. So easy to use. So fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Warichet Béatrice

customer_reviews.title: Great way to enjoy getting fit
customer_reviews.text: Love this! 45 min on the elliptical flies by using Trail Run. Changed my entire feeling about the morning workout
customer_reviews.author: CWM

customer_reviews.title: Having fun while getting fit!
customer_reviews.text: lots of games to choose from, doubled my time on the elliptical, challenging both body and mind - you won't regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenza

customer_reviews.title: I never thought exercise could be that much fun
customer_reviews.text: This may sound like Goji pays for my endorsement, but they are not: I love the product. The Play arrived a day after I ordered it and was installed and attached to my exercise bike in under a minute. I installed the app and a few free games - setup couldn't be easier. I was ready to go and transformed my workout routine into a fun game. Before I knew it a full hour had passed and I wasn't willing to get off my bike yet since I had so much fun. This is seriously awesome. Installation and setup are super easy. The games are amazing. The only "warning" I have: this is highly addictive :)
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it best workout game that Ive send for the home.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Makes exercise a game

Open the games from within the Goji Play App, not from the game icon directly. Highly recommended to make boring, repetitive exercise more fun!

customer_reviews.title: Add it to junk pile.

customer_reviews.title: A bit expensive but does make the workout seem shorter.

Down side is the cost because it is not available in the U.K yet I had to pay import tax of about £22 on top of the £87 for the Goji play. I would still recommend this to anyone who enjoys playing these types of games and working out.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me going.
customer_reviews.text: It does make the time fly and sure keeps me peddling.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but does not work with iPad 2
customer_reviews.text: will not connect to my ipad 2, It is a good idea and I wish it worked. The company was very understanding and are letting me return the product., and said thay are moving the required ipads to the top of the list so other customers will not have the same problem that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Betty W Swoveland

customer_reviews.title: Takes to much time.
customer_reviews.text: The unit did not respond well and took more time to activate. I lost interest and went back to my iPod
customer_reviews.author: robbin barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great way to get a longer workout in - and enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift (had seen it in an airline catalog and pointed it out to somebody) - and I am loving it. I am a regular exerciser, but like to have variety - and this adds that to my workouts. I was afraid I may not push as hard while on the bike or elliptical, but have found that I move at a similar pace (sometimes faster). There are a variety of games, so there should be something for everybody. I normally will do about 45 minutes on the elliptical, I just went over 60 and kind of wanted to keep going to get farther in the game I was playing.
customer_reviews.author: TJB016

customer_reviews.title: Love my Goji!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this for at least 6 months now and love love love it!! I purchased a mount for my ipad to put on my spin bike and now I can just play away. When I tire of the games, I leave Goji running, keep spinning and maybe read a magazine on the ipad. Goji continues to count my calories, minutes, miles and steps. And it syncs to myfitnesspal- love it!!! Buy this- it is a good investment for your exercise equipment- keeps you on it longer :)
customer_reviews.author: T Crane

customer_reviews.title: Working Out...or having fun!...Both!
customer_reviews.text: I have to agree with the reviews here. You work out and don't realize the time that has passed! We purchased two units so we could workout together (we have a treadmill and an exercise bike) and the time flies by when we are playing these games. Customer support is superb! Very quick to respond and help anyway they can! I went from boring 30 minute walks on the treadmill to over an hour a day picking up the pace! Our whole family loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Goji Play Lives Up to Its Hype!
customer_reviews.text: Time flies when you're having fun, and this is THE most fun I've ever had exercising! The 10 year old recumbent bike in our basement has gone from a forgotten dust collector to an amusement park ride! I cycle through 4-6 games for 5-10 or more each and violá! I've put in my daily 30-45 minutes. There are games/apps for all ages and interests with more coming out each week. LOVE MY GOJI PLAY!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! I haven't worked out this much in a long time!
customer_reviews.author: smf1234

customer_reviews.title: A great idea, but......
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Games were poorly designed. Wish it worked with already established games. A bit of connectivity issues. Sometimes didn't stay hooked up thru wi-fi. Most of the time it did. . I returned it. Waiting for better games. Definitely helped pass the time.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis M. Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Very simple to use...
customer_reviews.text: Best exercise device aid I've bought in a long time. Much easier to track your progress.

product_meta.title: Goji Play (Generation 1)
product_meta.description:
When purchasing your Goji Play, please make sure it's being sold by Blue Goji Corp. 

Goji Play transforms any cardio equipment into a games machine, making 30 minutes of exercise feel like 5. The wireless game controllers attached to cardio equipment such as elliptical trainers, treadmills, exercise bikes, or nearly any other piece of cardio equipment. The Activity Sensor measures progress towards fitness goals and incorporates movement into the games. 

Goji Play (Generation 1) Requires: 
Exercise equipment, such as stationary bikes, elliptical machines, stair-steppers and treadmills. (Because you cannot control the speed of treadmills, we recommend using Goji Play while walking on treadmills and not while running.) 
Goji Play app and games require iPad 3 and above, iPad Mini, iPod Touch 5th Generation, iPhone 5s and above running iOS 9 or above, and select Android devices running Android 5.0 or above. Please check our website or contact us at support@bluegoji.com for the latest information regarding mobile device compatibility. 

Goji Play (Generation 1) Includes: 
2 Game Controllers With Velcro Straps 
1 Activity Sensor 
1 Micro USB Charging Cable 
1 Wall Charger 
2 Foam Batons 
4 AAA Batteries. 
**NOTE: Product offered is the 2013 Generation 1 of Goji Play. This is NOT the 2015 Generation 2 of Goji Play. ** 
Visit http://www.bluegoji.com for more details. 

Thank you for your support!
feature_bullets: The iOS/Android game system you play while exercising on cardio machines.

Fuse Your Exercise With Games - With our Wireless Sensor, your movement is part of the game. And our game controllers either mount on your equipment or can be held in your hand…making the transformation complete.

Make Your New Interactive Workout Your Own - With a diverse and growing library of free games and apps, you can make your workout experience your own. And keep it fresh as we introduce new games and apps on a regular basis. See www.bluegoji.com for more information.

Personalize It For Each Member Of The Family - With up to 5 user accounts, each member of the family sets their own goals and choose their own games and apps. Motivate everyone in the house to get fit and have fun.

Product offered is the 2013 Generation 1 of Goji Play (as pictured), which requires one of the following: iPad 3 and above, iPad Mini, iPod Touch 5th Generation, iPhone 5s and above running iOS 9 or above, and select Android devices running Android 5.0 or above. Please check our website or contact us at support@bluegoji.com for more compatibility information.
